Articles.Content:
jeb is one crazy cookie

he keeps trying to jump on my experimental rockets and i keep throwing him off. but then this happened . im sure he would have smiled all the way to orbit if there was enough fuel.

does anything phase him?
Hmm, I did that except in a hover state on the Mun and Jeb was extremely displeased...
he stops smiling when he's on the ground.
He does get unhappy when things start exploding around him.
He sometimes seems a bit grumpy when I forget to attach a parachute to his re-entry vehicle...
I deorbited Jeb during EVA one time and he was really unhappy when the reentry heat started up.

This is funny because just this morning I dragged jeb to orbit "airskiing" on a released KAS winch.

It worked.

I've made Jeb unhappy. During re-entry, wait until you're about 100 m off the ground. Right-click, then "Cut Parachute". He actually looked scared. I'm not sure if it's possible to make him scared without killing him, though.
Yep. Setting phasers to stun doesn't faze Klingons.

I've made Jeb unhappy. During re-entry, wait until you're about 100 m off the ground. Right-click, then "Cut Parachute". He actually looked scared. I'm not sure if it's possible to make him scared without killing him, though.

It is. Try to launch a normal rocket with the Tricoupler, then add in some fuel tanks and an engine, and DON'T add struts. The rocket will launch normally and the unconnected fuel tanks will shake like mad and eventually explode, scaring Jeb. If you have a parachute on top of the command module, Jeb can still survive.
Explosions on or near the ship he's in, He doesn't like that too much.

I went through my imgur to see if I scared Jeb.

Turns out yes.

I was testing a simple 3 man pod with parachutes, some gas, and lander legs. Test was really just to make sure that the chutes wouldn't pop the pod off. Anyway came down successfully a little west of KSC, decently soft landing on chutes only, safe on the ground, cut the SAS, shutdown, all good. Looked over at Jeb, Bob, and Bill expecting to see them fist pumping and happy, and *ALL* 3 of them were completely freaking out!

This is Jeb in a nutshell.

In every single one of my games Jeb has never frowned, ever! Bill has never smiled. And Bob strangley seems to be about in the middle he loves low gravity and going down for some reason, while going up terrifies him. Bob's my favorite.

And is it just me, or do Bill and Bob look like a terrified green Beaker from the Muppets when they are scared? Also my favorite character on that show, him and the Chef.

Edited November 11, 2013 by Savage117

He sometimes seems a bit grumpy when I forget to attach a parachute to his re-entry vehicle...

Jeb: I dun' need nuu chute!

He was a little disappointed when the engine came of the starfighter he was flying.

Part 1

Any Landing you can walk away from...

-snip-

!

I suspect he has a secret phobia of one thing, like Indiana Jones with snakes. In my imagination, it's whatever Kerbin has that's the equivalent of spiders.
